item.description: We need volunteers to help stuff envelopes for our next Boston Local mailing! All of our materials and labor for our mailings are donated by volunteers, but we can always use another pair of hands. Join us for conversation and pizza as we get ready to get the word out about our upcoming actions and events!
item.how_to_find_us: Park in the driveway, take the T to Braintree and walk up Union Street and turn left on Washington - we're the first house on the left. Use the side door and ring the bell.
item.name: Local Mailing Meetup
